member.name: T:PX.CCProcessingBase.CCTranType
member.summary: Defines the credit card transaction types.

member.name: F:PX.CCProcessingBase.CCTranType.AuthorizeAndCapture
member.summary: Checks if the requested amount might be taken from the credit card, locks it on the credit card account, and takes the authorized amount from the card simultaneously.

member.name: F:PX.CCProcessingBase.CCTranType.AuthorizeOnly
member.summary: Checks if the requested amount might be taken from the credit card and locks it on the credit card account.

member.name: F:PX.CCProcessingBase.CCTranType.PriorAuthorizedCapture
member.summary: Captures the previously authorized transaction.

member.name: F:PX.CCProcessingBase.CCTranType.CaptureOnly
member.summary: Captures the manually authorized transaction.

member.name: F:PX.CCProcessingBase.CCTranType.Credit
member.summary: Returns the money back to the card.

member.name: F:PX.CCProcessingBase.CCTranType.Void
member.summary: Reverses the authorized or captured transaction.

member.name: F:PX.CCProcessingBase.CCTranType.VoidOrCredit
member.summary: Performs a void first and then performs a credit if the void failed.

member.name: T:PX.CCProcessingBase.CCTranStatus
member.summary: Contains the transaction statuses returned by the processing center.

member.name: F:PX.CCProcessingBase.CCTranStatus.Approved
member.summary: The transaction was approved.

member.name: F:PX.CCProcessingBase.CCTranStatus.Declined
member.summary: The transaction was declined.

member.name: F:PX.CCProcessingBase.CCTranStatus.Error
member.summary: An error occurred when the transaction is processed.

member.name: F:PX.CCProcessingBase.CCTranStatus.HeldForReview
member.summary: The transaction is under review.

member.name: F:PX.CCProcessingBase.CCTranStatus.Unknown
member.summary: There was no answer or the answer can't be interpreted.

summary.para: The class that contains the document data that Acumatica ERP passes to the payment plug-in. The document can be any of the following: an AR payment, a cash sale, a sales invoice, or a sales order.

member.name: P:PX.CCProcessingBase.Interfaces.V2.DocumentData.DocType
member.summary: The document type.
member.value:
Receives the value from one of the following DAC fields, depending on the type of the document from which the operation was invoked:
For an AR payment, ARPayment.DocType
For a cash sale, ARCashSale.DocType
For a sales invoice, SOInvoice.DocType
For a sales order, SOOrder.DocType
